title: Understanding the Role of a Sales Colleague
text: When seeking help from a sales colleague, consider what specific expertise or resources they can provide to support your initiative.

title: Clarifying the Need
text: Clarifying the need involves explaining why their assistance is crucial and what specific outcomes you aim to achieve with their help.

title: Choosing the Right Option
text: Among the options, which one best describes the initial step in collaborating with your sales colleague?
